headline: Phillips 66 (PSX) to Start Laying Off Los Angeles Refinery Workers in December, says report
summary: Phillips 66 (NYSE:PSX) is likely to lay off most workers at its Los Angeles refinery in December, reported Reuters on Thursday, citing sources familiar with the matter. In October last year, the company announced plans to cease operations at the facility during the fourth quarter of 2025, with Chairman and CEO Mark Lashier citing ‘market […]
